resources.string:
• No detection duration limit
• No scenario, events, conditions and actions creation count limitations
• Export/Import scenarios as zip files
• Communicate with other application via Intents
• Enable/Disable an event and change its state during the scenario execution
• Control the detection threshold for each condition
• Automatically stop the detection when certain end conditions are met
• Randomize your scenario values to avoid detection by other applications
• Tune the detection algorithm to improve its speed or its correctness
Thank you for buying\nSmart AutoClicker Pro !
This application is open source and crafted with love by people working on their free time.\n\nSupport the development by watching an ad, or buy Smart AutoClicker Pro to remove ads forever!
